post.body: Arctics that drop out of central and western Canada either bring bitter cold or ice here. Rarely get snow.
I'm a bit of a traditionalist. Like #1 Best. Possibly with Jolt in Italics. The Boxing tends to isolate Jolt from your purpose
I've always been a soft touch. Especially Christmas and Easter.
I say it but just as likely to say Merry Christmas. The difference to me not as much political correctness as total inclusiveness.
That's the way I shop for Christmas...only a week later. I know, the last part is a guy thing.
"without a basic understanding of Social Media."....How about those with no basic understanding of SOCIAL?
You must target your market. If you try to sell to everyone, you will sell to no one.
Heard it many times and w/ a few variations. Tried to find source before w/ no luck. Long standing marketing rule. Basically...
Bring a little warmer weather back with you. Have a wonderful trip.
"pedaling" it as fast as we can ;-)
Welcome, Kara. Not as bad as it seems. I think you have some well connected friends that lured you here. Be well!
Yup. Very disappointing ending. Be well!
Capitalize on the tourist trade and the mystique of Texas. Hope family has a great visit.
And all the best to you and yours, Trish. Merry Happy!
Ever been to any concerts at Greune Hall? Been a while for me but they are great. Old Time Texas for sure. Have Fun!
Don't need air conditioning in Dallas 2day. 79* yesterday. 2day estim. hi 34 Currently 28 with a WC 15 Not as bad as N & NE. Prayers Ur way
I've always been a soft touch. Especially Christmas and Easter.
Don't need air conditioning in Dallas 2day. 79* yesterday. 2day estim. hi 34 Currently 28 with a WC 15 Not as bad as N & NE. Prayers Ur way
Mentioned Fri. I saw biggest moon rise in long time. News confirmed today it was 14% bigger and 30% brighter than any in TX this year.
THis is the holiday season so including all holidays when I say it. I think you should say what you feel. Most won't be offended either way.
Chicken Scratch Mix and Cowboy football. Laid back and lovin' it!
Surpise #2 was on me. She didn't want to go out for special B-Day dinner. Reservations cancelled.
Celebrating my wife's 23rd anniversary of her 29th birthday today! Yellow Roses at breakfast surprised her. More surprises to come.
Gathered w/ 30 friends. White elephant xchange in 15 minute.
Here we go again. On the move.
Holiday open houses dominate the agenda. So many invites. We are blessed!
Life is an echo, what you send out comes back
Don't wait for a funeral to pay a compliment. You may not make it in time. --Harvey Mackay
Time to catch a quick couple hours nap before I start another great day!
To all my Jewish friends, I bid you Chag Sameach. May peace and happiness follow as you begin this special Holiday tonight. Happy Hannukah.
IT's gingerbread house making time.
RT Hope everyone can help make @TourDeTweets BIG as advert revenue will go to fund Pediatric Cancer Initiatives... Plz spread the word.
MMMMmmm Mmmmm Just finished Mushrooms stuffed with Italan Sausage my wife cooked. Now can the Dallas Cowboys get cooking? in second half.
Back from a long day in the ER. Dad finally admitted. Hope he'll be home for Christmas. That's his biggest worry
6:20 pm Another drive w/ the top down. Hi sunday will 30. Gotta love texas weather
Another awesome holiday luncheon completed. Texas B-B-Q and prizes. Friends and Fellowship. Lot's of Laughter. My kind of day!
Date night, dinner out with my honey.
OY! Vitamark Affiliates in Australia no longer limited to just Crave Energy Drinkâ„¢. Can now order from the U.S. website for personal use.
Our imagination is the only limit to what we can hope to have in the future. --Charles F. Kettering
The unexamined life is not worth living.-Socrates Where've you been? How'd you get where you are? Where are you going? Examination=Happiness
